game_description: We’re the indie studio that made Swarm and since day 1, you’ve all been asking us for multiplayer… Well here it is! This is a PROTOTYPE, that we're using to explore concepts and gauge feedback, so all the core fun and movement mechanics are there but expect unfinished assets, and the occasional bug/networking issue. Atmos Arena is now FREE for a limited time on App Lab: _Race through a massive city environment, with multiple courses _Swing with grappling hooks _Fly with rocket boosters _Currently supports up to 10 players, with voice chat _Use grav boosts to scale soaring skyscrapers and explore the underground caves _Deathmatch *Quest 2 only for now
review_1: This game has potential. The many multiplayer modes are interesting, and the grappling in spot on. The big issue is the lack of content. I know this is still early in development, so I hope this can be fixed soon!
review_2: This game doesn't even let me play it. When ever I go on the game, it says I need to update it and then kicks me out of the game. Could someone please help me with this. I don't know if it's a glitch or not but what ever it is I really want it gone!
review_3: Add ￼Story mode and A menu Where￼ can select story mode￼￼
review_4: When I downloaded the game I was doing the tutorial and when I finished It was like upgrading something I don’t know but when Itwas finishing it kicked me out the game and when I refreshed the game It went out the game and then went back in it was loading but then it kicked me every time the game Kicks￼ me out￼
review_5: Makes me wanna turn off my grandma's life support
